sentences.english: Next you should clean up the hard disk.
Third, the laptop won't be able to save a lot of data as there is no hard drive.
sentences.chinese: 第三，这款笔电没有硬碟，无法储存大笔资料。

sentences.english: The Disk Cleanup tool helps you free up space on your hard disk.
sentences.chinese: 磁盘清理工具，可以帮助你自由空间，对您的硬碟中。

sentences.english: I got to download some drivers and rest trial software came to my harddrive.
sentences.chinese: 我得下载一些驱动程式和其他的软体到我的硬碟。

sentences.english: My computer doesn't recognize my new hard drive for some reason.
sentences.chinese: 不晓得为什么，我的电脑没办法辨认我的新硬碟。

sentences.english: Dedicate and mount a physical hard disk to each virtual machine.
sentences.chinese: 让每个虚拟机器都有专属的挂接实体硬碟。

sentences.english: Transfer the game to internal HDD and try again.
sentences.chinese: 把游戏灌到内置硬碟再重新运行试试看。

sentences.english: Someone has finally mass-released solid state memory chips to replace the hard drives.
sentences.chinese: 某人终于开始量产可以取代硬碟的固态储存晶片。

sentences.english: But now current hard-drive technologies are hitting a new wall.
sentences.chinese: 不过到了今天，现有的硬碟技术却即将碰到新的难题。

sentences.english: Safely eliminates files and folders that clog your PC's hard drive.
sentences.chinese: 消除安全的文件和文件夹阻塞你的电脑的硬碟中。

sentences.english: The HDD and multimedia products become to Singapore's IT flagship product.
sentences.chinese: 硬碟机和多媒体制品成为新加坡资讯主力产品。

sentences.english: This is exclusive of hard disk space you want to use for caching.
sentences.chinese: 这不包括要用于快取的硬碟空间。

sentences.english: Put the hard disk drive into the rack, and align the screws at the screw holes.
sentences.chinese: 将硬碟机放入机架中，然后将螺丝对准螺丝孔。

sentences.english: Smaller is better when it comes to hard disk capacity.
sentences.chinese: 规模较小，是较好的时候，说到硬碟容量。

definition: USB flash drive (Tw)/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]

pinyin: bi3 ji4 ben3 ji4 suan4 ji1
